docs.title: Me
docs.text:
Chao-Zhong Deng

邓朝钟

Undergraduate. I'm a student majoring in Intelligent Science and Technology at the Liangjiang Artificial Intelligence College of Chongqing University of Technology. Currently, I'm a senior exchange student at the College of Excellent Engineers of Chongqing University. My graduation project is about the security of large models. If you have anything you'd like to discuss with me, feel free to reach out.

Bio 2024.09-2025.06 An undergraduate exchange student at the National Institute for Excellent Engineers, Chongqing University, majoring in Intelligent Connected Vehicles. 2021.09-2025.06 An undergraduate student at the Liangjiang Artificial Intelligence College, Chongqing University of Technology, majoring in Intelligent Science and Technology.

docs.title: Description
docs.text: 这里存放了一些我的一些博客和笔记，你可以通过左边的目录查看自己感兴趣的内容。

docs.title: 1.1 废话
docs.text: 本网站通过Mkdocs构建静态网站，并通过宝塔部署在服务器上。 本文记录搭建的过程。

docs.title: 1.2 前期准备
docs.text:
最低配置：一台电脑 + Github账号（Github Pages当做服务器）

高级配置：一台电脑 + Github账号（用于备份） + 一台服务器

  • 一台电脑

你的常用设备，用于安装Mkdocs，本地编写Wiki文档、博客，方便保存文件。

  • 一台服务器

你的网站部署终端，

docs.title: 服务器安装宝塔
docs.text:
官网说明：https://www.bt.cn/new/download.html

Linux安装指令如下：

宝塔Linux安装指令
if [ -f /usr/bin/curl ];then curl -sSO https://download.bt.cn/install/install_panel.sh;else wget -O install_panel.sh https://download.bt.cn/install/install_panel.sh;fi;bash install_panel.sh ed8484bec

docs.title: 在宝塔面板配置服务器环境
将生成的文件上传宝塔
